Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) {WAVE STRIKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a creature that evolves from a Dragon from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature breaks a shield, at the end of the turn, destroy this creature. Each player then chooses a card in their mana zone and puts it into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature gets +2000 power for each civilization in the battle zone. ■ Whenever this creature has power 6000 or more, it gets "double breaker". (This creature breaks 2 shields.)"

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Cards in your mana zone are considered to be cards of every civilization.

card.name: The Grave of Angels and Demons

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ If there are 2 or more creatures that have the same name in the battle zone, destroy all of them. ■ Look at each player's mana zone. If there are 2 or more cards that have the same name, put all of them into their owner's graveyards.
